title: Oh, to be a little gecko crawling up some walls in this exploration platformer
description: Climb walls, eat bugs, embrace your inner lizard.

title: The Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection popped up on Steam with a notice it wouldn't support mouse & keyboard before disappearing a half hour later
description: Konami tweeted a statement that it's "currently working on releasing the pre-order page" on Steam.

title: Just like nobody asked for, YouTube is reportedly testing in-app and in-site gaming
description: An internal email seen by the Wall Street Journal discusses the "Playables" initiative.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #735: Saturday, June 24
description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for Saturday's puzzle.
